column4: or you could edit /etc/network/interfaces yourself and do ifup -a or /etc/init.d/network restart whatever floats your boat
I tried the eth0 down/up and that didn't work. gonna try the network restart
when I look at the /etc/network/interfaces it has all my correct network settings but still can't get to my network. any more ideas?
ifconfig reports the settings ok, routing table, is your link up on eth?
